raw_text: RITA ROMOLD – Loving wife of P.S. Sugunakumar,​ beloved mother of Kishan and Ashan,​ daughter of late Saveriamma & late Arokiam,​ sister of Punitha,​ Jeev,​ Pushpa (Norway) & Anton (Italy) and sister-in-law of late Roy,​ Sri,​ Boni & Julie. Remains lie at 56/​46,​ St. Benedict’s Mawatha,​ Kotahena on 8th July & at No. 426/​2,​ Jasmine – VTV Courts,​ K. Cyril C. Perera Mawatha,​ Kotahena on 9th July. Cortege leaves residence at 3.00 p.m. for burial at the Madampitiya Public Cemetery.042228

WIJETUNGE – M.H.D. TISSA – (Formerly of the Department of Town & Country Planning and in Uganda,​ Nigeria,​ Qatar and Australia),​ passed away on 14th in Sydney,​ Australia after a long illness. He was the husband and step father of Jembu & Sukie and the brother of Peter,​ Matilda and the late Alfred and Gamini. 00610432919374.041583
